tweet: identifying the latest in survival gear
#1 Rule of How To Survive an Earthquake- "STAY INSIDE!" Get under a desk, table & hang on for dear life! Next best place is www.uSurvive.net
Survival Tip #2, when lost in a desert, Do not panic! If you have or are near a vehicle, stay near it... do not wander, go www.usurvive.net
Survival Tip #3, if someone is shooting a gun at you then run fast! An untrained shooter won't be accurate at a distance greater than 60ft.
Survival Tip #4, find all supplies & info you need from uSurvive.net! The leader in at-home emergency preparedness, goto http://bit.ly/3F3LG
